All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ChatActivity
Activity used to display a chat interface between local user and another user account.
CreateRecipeActivity
Activity for a user to create a recipe
EditProfileActivity
Activity for user to edit their profile information
EntryActivity
Activity which allows client to choose to login to their account, signup for an account, or continue as a guest user, and brings them to the corresponding activity for their choice
FollowingActivity
Activity to display recent recipes published by users that the local user follows
LoginActivity
Activity for client to login to their account
MessageAdapter
Adapter class for a list of messages
MessageItemObject
Class to model a single chat message and its data
MyChatsActivity
 
PasswordCheckActivity
 
ProfileActivity
Activity to display local user's profile
ProfileAdapter
Adapter class for a list of profiles
ProfileItemObject
Class to model a single profile preview object and it's data
RecipeAdapter
Adapter class for a list of recipes
RecipeItemObject
Class to model a single recipe preview object and it's data
SavedActivity
Activity to list the recipes saved by the local user
SearchActivity
Activity for user to search for recipes by name or category
SignupActivity
Activity for client to create an account
SplashActivity
 
TrendingActivity
Activity to display recipes that have recently become popular and well rated on the platform
ViewRecipeActivity
Activity to view a single recipe in its entirety
VolleySingleton
Singleton class for Volley requests
WebSocketListener
Interface defining methods for handling WebSocket events.
WebSocketManager
Singleton WebSocketManager instance used for managing WebSocket connections in the Android application.
